title: Generate Daily Revenue Report
description: The hotel's general manager needs the daily revenue report from yesterday.

tasks.expected_outcome: Agent is in the correct system module.

tasks.description: Generate the 'Daily Manager's Report' for the previous day's date.
The report should show a breakdown of revenue by source (rooms, F&B, other) and key metrics like Occupancy, ADR, and RevPAR.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent verifies the report contains all the correct data points and is accurate.
